actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish a National Commission on Immigration Policy to examine and analyze the social and economic impact of the presence of undocumented aliens in the United States, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Commission on Immigration Policy Act

summary.text: National Commission on Immigration Policy Act - Establishes a National Commission on Immigration Policy to study existing laws and policies governing the admission of immigrants to the United States and their effect on United States social, economic, and foreign policies. Sets forth the powers of such Commission.

titles.title: National Commission on Immigration Policy Act

A bill to establish a National Commission on Immigration Policy to examine and analyze the social and economic impact of the presence of undocumented aliens in the United States, and for other purposes.
